1: <pb/><e>Bit yet Salomón chi bitnelay yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>Ta manak Jehová chi watx'nen na, nabac'al mi chi mulnaj eb mulnajwom. Ta manak Cham chi taynen conob, nabac'al mi chi taynelay yuj eb centinela.</t>
2: <t>Nabac'al chi yetnej eb c'ul mulnaj masanil c'u, cax ayc'al oc eb yin bilc'ulal yet chi low eb, yujtol a Dios xin, chi yak' watx'c'ulal bay eb is camc'ulnebil, yak'ban chi way eb.</t>
3: <pb/><t>A eb unin chi alji ayon, sabal Jehová yayji eb, cax ochebil toni.</t>
4: <t>A eb unin chi alji ayon yin jach'ejal, axca wal julbalej eb yul k'ab nak ak'om owal.</t>
5: <t>Tzalojc'ulal yet mac xiwil is julbal axca juntzan tu'. Man ok el q'uixwil yuj eb ajc'ul oc yin, yet chi colon ba satak eb juez.</t>
